chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
factorial_cancel: forall n a b : nat, fact n * a = fact n * b -> a = b
p: nat
Hp: p <> 0
expo_p_cancel: forall n a b : nat, expo n p * a = expo n p * b -> a = b
phi_Zp_eq: forall n r : nat, 〚 φ n r 〛 = 〚 fact r 〛
Psi_Zp_eq: forall n : nat, 〚 Ψ n 〛 = expoZp n 〚 fact (p - 1) 〛
Hprime: prime p
phi_Zp_invertible: forall n r : nat, r < p -> Zp_invertible Hp 〚 φ n r 〛
Psi_Zp_invertible: forall n : nat, Zp_invertible Hp 〚 Ψ n 〛
k0: nat
K: nat
k: nat
n0: nat
N: nat
n: nat
Hn: n = N * p + n0
Hk: k = K * p + k0
H1: K <= N
H2: k0 <= n0
Hkn: k <= n
Hnk: n - k = (N - K) * p + (n0 - k0)

Goal:
φ K k0 * Ψ K * φ (N - K) (n0 - k0) * Ψ (N - K) * binomial n k = binomial N K * φ N n0 * Ψ N

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Notation expoZp := (mscal (Zp_mult Hp) Op)
binomial = fix binomial (n p : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => match p with | 0 => 1 | S _ => 0 end | S n0 => match p with | 0 => 1 | S p0 => binomial n0 p0 + binomial n0 (S p0) end end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments binomial (_ _)%nat_scope
fact = fix fact (n : nat) : nat := match n with | 0 => 1 | S n0 => S n0 * fact n0 end : nat -> nat Arguments fact _%nat_scope
prime = fun p : nat => p <> 1 /\ (forall q : nat, divides q p -> q = 1 \/ q = p) : nat -> Prop Arguments prime _%nat_scope
Zp_invertible : forall p : nat, p <> 0 -> Z_Zp p -> Prop
Notation expo := power

VarMap.Branch : VarMap.t ?A -> ?A -> VarMap.t ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [factorial_cancel : forall n a b : nat, fact n * a = fact n * b -> a = b p : nat Hp : p <> 0 expo_p_cancel : forall n a b : nat, expo n p * a = expo n p * b ->...-> Zp_invertible Hp 〚 φ n r 〛 Psi_Zp_invertible : forall n : nat, Zp_invertible Hp 〚 Ψ n 〛 n : nat N : nat n0 : nat k : nat K : nat k0 : nat Hn : n = N * p + n0 Hk : k = K * p + k0 H1 : K <= N H2 : k0 <= n0 Hkn : k <= n Hnk : n - k = (N - K) * p + (n0 - k0) |- Type]
mprod_factorial_euclid : forall n r : nat, fact (n * p + r) = expo n p * fact n * Π r (fun i : nat => i + (n * p + 1)) * Π n (fun i : nat => Π (p - 1) (fun i0 : nat => i0 + (i * p + 1)))
binomial_spec : forall n p : nat, p <= n -> fact n = binomial n p * fact p * fact (n - p)
binomial_thm : forall n p : nat, p <= n -> fact n = binomial n p * fact p * fact (n - p)
Newton_nat : forall a b n : nat, expo n (a + b) = msum add 0 (S n) (fun i : nat => binomial n i * expo (n - i) a * expo i b)
mprod_factorial_Zp : forall i n : nat, 〚 Π n (fun i0 : nat => i0 + (i * p + 1)) 〛 = 〚 fact n 〛
binomial_le : forall n p : nat, p <= n -> binomial n p = div (fact n) (fact p * fact (n - p))
mprod_factorial_mult : forall n : nat, fact (n * p) = expo n p * fact n * Π n (fun i : nat => Π (p - 1) (fun i0 : nat => i0 + (i * p + 1)))
bezout_rel_prime_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> is_gcd p q 1 -> {a : nat & {b : nat | a * p + b * q = 1 + p * q /\ a <= q /\ b <= p}}
div_prop : forall q p n r : nat, q = n * p + r -> r < p -> div q p = n
bezout_generalized_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> {a : nat & {b : nat & {g : nat & {l : nat & {u : nat & {v : nat | a * p + b * q = g + l /\ is_gcd p q g /\ is_lcm p q l /\ p = u * g /\ q = v * g /\ a <= v /\ b <= u}}}}}}
bezout_sc : forall p q a b m : nat, a * p + b * q = 1 + m -> divides p m \/ divides q m -> is_gcd p q 1
Nat.mul_sub_distr_r : forall n m p : nat, (n - m) * p = n * p - m * p
euclid : forall n d : nat, d <> 0 -> {q : nat & {r : nat | n = q * d + r /\ r < d}}
Newton_nat_S : forall a n : nat, expo n (1 + a) = msum add 0 (S n) (fun i : nat => binomial n i * expo i a)
is_gcd_modulus : forall p q k r : nat, divides p k -> k <= q -> is_gcd p q r -> is_gcd p (q - k) r
is_lcm_moduplus : forall k p q g l u : nat, p = u * g -> is_gcd p q g -> is_lcm p q l -> is_lcm p (q + k * p) (l + k * u * p)
Zp_divides_and_invertible : forall (p : nat) (Hp : p <> 0) (d k n i : nat), d * k = n -> Zp_mult Hp (nat2Zp Hp i) (nat2Zp Hp d) = Zp_one Hp -> nat2Zp Hp k = Zp_mult Hp (nat2Zp Hp i) (nat2Zp Hp n)
plus_cancel_l : forall a b c : nat, a + b = a + c -> b = c
Nat.add_sub_assoc : forall n m p : nat, p <= m -> n + (m - p) = n + m - p
rem_plus_div : forall p : nat, p <> 0 -> forall a b : nat, divides p b -> rem a p = rem (a + b) p

```coq
rewrite <- phi_Zp_eq.
rewrite <- phi_Zp_eq.
rewrite <- Psi_Zp_eq.
rewrite <- Psi_Zp_eq.
rewrite <- binomial_le with (n:=N)(p:=K).
rewrite mprod_factorial_mult.
rewrite mprod_factorial_mult.
rewrite mprod_factorial_mult.
rewrite mprod_factorial_mult.
rewrite <- mprod_factorial_euclid with (n:=N-K)(r:=n0-k0).
rewrite <- mprod_factorial_euclid with (n:=K)(r:=k0).
rewrite <- mprod_factorial_euclid with (n:=N)(r:=n0).
rewrite <- mprod_factorial_euclid with (n:=K)(r:=k0).
rewrite Newton_nat with (a:=n0)(b:=k0)(n:=N-K).
rewrite Newton_nat with (a:=k0)(b:=n0)(n:=K).
rewrite <- Newton_nat with (a:=n0-k0)(n:=N-K).
rewrite <- Newton_nat with (a:=k0)(n:=K).
rewrite Nat.mul_sub_distr_r.
rewrite Nat.mul_sub_distr_r.
rewrite Nat.mul_sub_distr_r.
rewrite Nat.mul_sub_distr_r.
rewrite Hn.
rewrite Hk.
rewrite Hnk.
rewrite Nat.add_sub_assoc.
rewrite Nat.add_sub_assoc.
rewrite Nat.add_sub_assoc.
rewrite Nat.add_sub_assoc.
rewrite <- binomial_thm with (n:=N)(p:=K).
rewrite <- binomial_thm with (n:=K)(p:=k).
apply plus_cancel_l.
apply plus_cancel_l.
apply plus_cancel_l.
apply plus_cancel_l.
apply factorial_cancel.
Qed.  
```
